Job Posting:169550 - Position: F25 Software Development Co-op (8 Month) 169550B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 05/23/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/09/2025 03:16 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Oncoustics 100 College Street Toronto M5G 1L5 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Software Development Co-op (8 Month) 169550B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Oncoustics is a start-up that uses AI on ultrasound data to help find disease. We are looking to hire a student for an 8 month Co- Op term. Eligible applicants should be in their second year or beyond in a computer engineering or medical based field, and have some programming experience. Specifics of the opportunity include: Responsibility • Enhance existing, or develop new, software programs in one (or more) of mobile, backend, or cloud • Support QA of company solutions Collaborate with other team members for most efficient development • Job Requirements Requirements • Must be actively enrolled in an accredited Canadian University or College during the co-op placement. • Experience in coding, ideally in either a mobile or server framework • Completed at least the second year, and currently enrolled in an accredited Canadian University in Engineering, Comp Sci, Physics, Math, etc • Must be a Canadian Citizen or Permanent Resident Must be willing to come into our Toronto Office, 155 Queens Quay East • Good To Have • Prior experience in the biomedical field Self-motivated • Citizenship Requirement Canadian & Permanent Residents Only APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Software Development Co-op (8 Months) Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
